{{VO/Story
|character           = Ganyu

|name                = 감우

|vo_01_01_title      = 첫 만남...
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 알겠습니다. 파견 근무의 「계약」을 완성했으니 한 번 보세요. 오늘부터 당신을 위해… 어… 아! 서명을 안 했다고요? 잠시만요. 음… 이름은 감, 감우… 휴, 다 됐습니다. 그래서 구체적인 업무는 뭐죠?
|vo_01_01_rm         = Algesseupnida. Pagyeon geunmu-ui "Gyeyak"eul wanseonghaesseuni han beon boseyo. Oneulbuteo dangsineul wihae... eo... a! Seomyeong-eul an haetdagoyo? Jamsimanyo. Eum... ireumeun Gam, Gamu... hyu, da dwaesseupnida. Geuraeseo guchejeogin eommuneun mwojyo?
|vo_01_01_tl         = Alright. I have finished the "Contract" of the dispatch service, so take a look. From today, I will work for you... oh... ah! I didn't sign my name? Wait a moment. Hmm... my name is Gan, Ganyu... phew, it's all done. So what are the details?

|vo_02_01_title      = 잡담・느슨함
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Relaxed
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Relaxed.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = 편안한 분위기… 마음에 들어요
|vo_02_01_rm         = Pyeonanhan bunwigi... maeume deureoyo
|vo_02_01_tl         = A comfortable atmosphere... I like it.
|vo_02_02_title      = 잡담・경청
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Attentive
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Attentive.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 초원에 엎드리면 대지의 심장 소리를 들을 수 있어요
|vo_02_02_rm         = Chowone eopdeurimyeon daeji-ui simjang sorireul deureul su isseoyo
|vo_02_02_tl         = If you lie face down on the meadow, you can hear the heartbeat of the earth.
|vo_02_03_title      = 잡담・초조함
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Anxious
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Anxious.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 일…일을 아직 다 못 끝냈는데… 정말 미리 휴식해도 되는 걸까요?
|vo_02_03_rm         = Il... ireul ajik da mot kkeutnaetneunde... jeongmal miri hyusikhaedo doeneun geolkkayo?
|vo_02_03_tl         = Work... I didn't finish all my work... can I really rest first?

<!-- Weather -->
|vo_03_01_title      = 비가 올 때・걱정
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains: Worries
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains - Worries.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 비운상회에서 기르는 예상꽃은 충분한 비가 필요해요. 음… 하지만 화물을 운송하는 사람들은 비가 그친 후 진흙탕이 된 산길을 싫어하죠…
|vo_03_01_rm         = Biunsanghoeeseo gireuneun yesangkkocheun chungbunhan biga piryohaeyo. Eum... hajiman hwamureul unsonghaneun saramdeureun biga geuchin hu jinheuktang-i doen sangireul sireohajyo...
|vo_03_01_tl         = The silk flowers that are cultivated from the Feiyun Commerce Guild need enough rain. Hmm... but the people who transport cargo dislike the mountain road that became mud after rain...
|vo_03_02_title      = 비가 올 때・빗소리 듣기
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When It Rains: Listening to the Rain
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains - Listening to the Rain.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 정원에서 빗소리를 듣는 건 참 좋지만, 너무 사치에요
|vo_03_02_rm         = Jeong'woneseo bitsorireul deutneun geon cham jochiman, neomu sachieyo
|vo_03_02_tl         = It's nice to hear rain sounds in the garden, but it's a luxury.
|vo_03_03_title      = 비가 그친 후…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = After the Rain
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} After the Rain.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 네? 날이 갰다고요? 언제…
|vo_03_03_rm         = Ne? Nari gaetdagoyo? Eonje...
|vo_03_03_tl         = Yes? The sky cleared up? When...
|vo_03_04_title      = 햇살이 좋을 때...
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Sun Is Out
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Sun Is Out.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = 음, 기분 좋은 공기네요
|vo_03_04_rm         = Eum, gibun joeun gonggineyo
|vo_03_04_tl         = Mhm, the air feels pleasant.
|vo_03_05_title      = 바람이 불 때...
|vo_03_05_subtitle   = When It's Windy
|vo_03_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It's Windy.ogg
|vo_03_05_tx         = 아, 유리백합 향기는 정말 좋네요…
|vo_03_05_rm         = A, yuribaekhap hyanggineun jeongmal jonneyo...
|vo_03_05_tl         = Ah, the scent of glaze lilies are so fine...

|vo_04_01_title      = 아침 인사…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = 좋은 아침입니다. 어… 제 머리에 헝클어진 곳이라도 있나요? 제 머리 장식을… 그렇게 빤히 보지 말아 주세요
|vo_04_01_rm         = Joeun achimipnida. Eo... je meorie heongkeureojin gosirado innayo? Je meori jangsigeul... geureoke ppanhi boji mara juseyo
|vo_04_01_tl         = Good morning. Uh... is there a mess in my hair? Don't stare at my hair ornament... like that/
|vo_04_02_title      = 점심 인사…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 아… 낮잠이 필요해요. 별다른 일이 없다면… 전 먼저 가볼게요
|vo_04_02_rm         = A... natjami piryohaeyo. Byeoldareun iri eopdamyeon... jeon meonjeo gabolkkeyo
|vo_04_02_tl         = Ah... I need a nap. If there is nothing important in particular... I'll take my leave first.
|vo_04_03_title      = 저녁 인사…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = 수많은 등불이 눈앞에 펼쳐져 있네요. 사람들의 생활은 대체 어떤 모습일까요… 네? 야시장에 함께 가자고요? 아… 죄, 죄송해요. 전 안 갈래요
|vo_04_03_rm         = Sumaneun deungburi nunape pyeolchyeojyeo inneyo. Saramdeul-ui saenghwareun daeche eotteon moseubilkkayo... ne? Yasijang'e hamkke gajagoyo? A... joe, joesonghaeyo. Jeon an gallaeyo
|vo_04_03_tl         = A lot of lanterns are spread out in front of us. What is life like for people... What? Going to the night market together? Oh... I, I'm sorry. I don't want to go.
|vo_04_04_title      = 굿나잇…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = 제군이 당신을 지켜주시길, 편안하고 달콤한 꿈 꾸세요
|vo_04_04_rm         = Jeguni dangsineul jikyeojusigil, pyeonanhago dalkomham kkum kkuseyo
|vo_04_04_tl         = May Rex Lapis protect you, have a comfortable and sweet dream.

|vo_05_01_title      = 감우 자신에 대해...
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character}.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 제 일은 제군과의 「계약」에 따라, 리월의 많은 생명을 위해 최고의 복지를 강구하는 것이죠
|vo_05_01_rm         = Je ireun jegungwaui "Gyeyak"e ttara, Riwol-ui maneun saengmyeong'eul wihae choego-ui bokjireul gangguhaneun geosijyo
|vo_05_01_tl         = My job is to work on the best welfare for many lives in Liyue, according to my "Contract" with Rex Lapis.

|vo_06_01_title      = 우리에 대해・업무
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Work
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Work.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 오늘의 업무는 진작 다 마쳤어요. 추,추가 근무요? …알겠습니다. 최선을 다해 완료할게요
|vo_06_01_rm         = Oneurui eommuneun jinjak da machyeosseoyo. Chu, chuga geunmuyo? ...Algesseupnida. Choesoneul dahae wanryohalgeyo
|vo_06_01_tl         = I've already finished today's work. E, extra work? ...I see. I'll do my best to complete it.
|vo_06_02_title      = 우리에 대해・부탁
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Requests
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Requests.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 인간에 대한 이야기를 더 많이 알고 싶어요… 특히, 당신이 그들에 대해 어떻게 평가하는지 알고 싶어요. 왜냐면 당신은 티바트 대륙의 평범한 사람들과는 다르니까요. 저도 그렇고요… 부디 저에게 전부 알려주세요
|vo_06_02_rm         = Ingane daehan iyagireul deo mani algo sipeoyo... teukhi, dangsini geudeure daehae eotteoke pyeonggahaneunji algo sipeoyo. Waenyamyeon dangsineun Tibateu daeryuk-ui pyeongbeomhan saramdeulgwaneun dareunikkayo. Jeodo geureotgoyo... budi jeoege jeonbu allyeojuseyo
|vo_06_02_tl         = I'd like to know more stories about humans... Especially, I'd like to know how you evaluate them. Because you're not like the average person on Teyvat. So am I... Please tell me everything.
|vo_06_03_title      = 우리에 대해・평가
|vo_06_03_subtitle   = About Us: Evaluation
|vo_06_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Evaluation.ogg
|vo_06_03_tx         = 음… 전, 당신이 제 업무에 대해 어떻게 평가하는지 알고 싶어요. …일반 보물상자의 레벨인가요 아니면 화려한 보물상자의 레벨인가요. 괘, 괜찮아요. 받아들일 수 있어요
|vo_06_03_rm         = Eum... jeon, dangsini je eommue daehae eotteoke pyeonggahaneunji algo sipeoyo. ...Ilban bomulsangja-ui reberingayo animyeon hwaryeohan bomulsangja-ui reberingayo. Gwae, gwaenchanayo. Badadeuril su isseoyo
|vo_06_03_tl         = Hmm... I want to know how you evaluate my tasks. ...Is it the level of a normal chest, or a luxurious chest. I, it's alright. I can handle it.

|vo_07_01_title      = 「신의 눈」에 대해...
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 「모든 권력에는 책임이 따른다」고 하죠. 널리 고금을 볼 수 있는 시야를 지녔지만, 어쩔 수 없이 자신의 삶을 포기하신 제군이야말로 리월에서 가장 피곤한 사람이겠죠. 그에 비해 단순히 평범한 「신의 눈」을 지녀 평범한 책임만 지면 되는 전, 훨씬 편하죠
|vo_07_01_rm         = "Moden gwonryeogeneun chaegimi ttareunda"go hajyo. Neolli gogeumeul bol su inneun siyareul gajyeotjiman, eojjeol su eopssi jasin-ui salmeul pogihasi jeguniyamallo Riworeseo gajang pigonhan saramigetjyo. Geue bihae dansunhi pyeongbeomhan "Sin-ui Nun"eul jinyeo pyeongbeomhan chaegimman jimyeon doeneun jeon, hwolssin pyeonhajyo
|vo_07_01_tl         = There is the saying "All power comes with responsibility". Rex Lapis has a wide view of the world, but he must be the most tired person in Liyue since he had no choice but to give up his life. But I'm much more comfortable with a normal "Vision" and an average responsibility.

|vo_07_02_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기...
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 「모든 상회가 운집하고 배들이 끝없이 드나들며, 온갖 화물이 들고나고 온 바다를 두루 품네」 사람들은 이렇게 리월을 칭송하죠. 하지만 이런 장관이 있기까지, 수많은 사람의 노력이 있었습니다. 전 이 영광에 걸맞는 마음가짐으로 업무에 임하고 있어요.
|vo_07_02_rm         = "Modeun sanghoega unjiphago baedeuri kkeudeopssi deunadeulmyeo, ongat hwamuri deulgonago on badareul duru pumne" saramdeureun ireoke Riworeul chingsonghajyo. Hajiman ireon janggwani itgikkaji, sumaneun saram-ui noryeogi isseotdapnida. Jeon i yeonggwang'e geolmatneun maeumgajimeuro eommue imhago isseoyo
|vo_07_02_tl         = "All the shops are crowded, ships come and go endlessly, all kinds of cargo come and go, and it embraces the whole sea," People praise Liyue like this. But there has been a lot of effort from people until this grand sight could be seen. I'm working with a mindset worthy of this honor.
|vo_07_03_title      = 흥미있는 일・이름
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Facts: Name
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Facts - Name.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 리월에서 사는 모든 강아지에게 이름을 지어줬어요. 어떤 강아지는 다른 이름으로 불러도 반응을 보입니다. 정말 대단하죠. 누군가 갑자기 절 「고설」이라고 부른다면 전 반응하지 못할 거예요
|vo_07_03_rm         = Riworeseo saneun modeun gang'ajiege ireumeul jieojwosseoyo. Eotteon gang'ajineun dareun ireumeuro bulleodo bang'eung'eul boindapnida. Jeongmal daedanhajyo. Nugunga gapjagi jeol "Goseol"irago bureundamyeon jeon baneunghaji mothal geoeyo
|vo_07_03_tl         = I named all dogs that live in Liyue. Some dogs respond even though I call it with another name. Very incredible. If someone suddenly calls me "Bantu", I couldn't respond.
|vo_07_04_title      = 흥미있는 일・청심
|vo_07_04_subtitle   = Interesting Facts: Qingxin
|vo_07_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Facts - Qingxin.ogg
|vo_07_04_tx         = 청심화 꽃잎은 맛있어요… 매우 맛있다고 할 수 있죠. 너무 맛있어서 차마 옥경대에 심질 못하고 있어요. 혹시라도 못 참고… 에? 엄청… 쓰다고요? 하지만 청심화는 원래 그런 맛이잖아요
|vo_07_04_rm         = Cheongsimhwa kkotipeun masisseoyo... maeu masitdago hal su itjyo. Neomu masisseoseo chama okgyeongdaee simjil mothago isseoyo. Hoksirado mot chamgo... e? Eomcheong... sseudagoyo? Hajiman cheongsimhwaneun wonrae geureon masijanayo
|vo_07_04_tl         = Qingxin flower petals are delicious... it's very delicious. It's so delicious that I can't plant it in Yujing Terrace. Just in case I can't stand it and... What? It's very bitter? But that's how Qingxin flowers taste.

|vo_08_01_title      = 모락스에 대해・신뢰
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Morax]]: Trust
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Morax - Trust.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 전 제군을 절대적으로 신뢰합니다. 그때 제군이 계셨기에 우리는 마물과 바다의 괴수를 처치하고 이곳의 평화를 지킬 수 있었죠. 제군이 모두를 지키던 모습, 천 년이 넘는 우정을 전 잊지 못할 겁니다
|vo_08_01_rm         = Jeon jeguneun jeoldaejeogeoro sinroehapnida. Geuttae jeguni gyesyeotgie urineun mamulgwa bada-ui goesureul cheochihago igosui pyeonghwareul jikil su isseotjyo. Jeguni modureul jikideon moseup, cheon nyeoni neomneun ujeong'eul jeon itji mothal geopnida
|vo_08_01_tl         = I have absolute confidence in Rex Lapis. We were able to get rid of demons and sea monsters and keep peace here because of Rex Lapis then. I'll never forget how Rex Lapis protected everyone, and our friendship over a thousand years.

|vo_08_02_title      = 모락스에 대해・추종
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About Morax: Follower
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Morax - Follower.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 제군의 결단은 항상 리월의 수많은 생명에게 큰 복을 가져다줬죠. 그런 점에서 전 그분을 무척 존경해요. 그렇게 되고 싶기도 하고… 하지만 때론 제군의 발걸음을 좇으려고 할수록 긴장해서 더 실수를 하더라고요…
|vo_08_02_rm         = Jegun-ui gyeoldaneun hangsang Riwol-ui sumaneun sangmyeong'ege keun bogeul gajyeodajwotjyo. Geureon jeomeseo jeon geubuneul mucheok jongyeonghaeyo. Geureoke doego sipgido hago... hajiman ttaeron jegun-ui balgeoreumeul jocheuryeogo halsurok ginjanghaeseo deo silsureul hadeoragoyo...
|vo_08_02_tl         = Rex Lapis' decisions have always brought great blessings to many lives in Liyue. I admire him very much in that aspect. I'd like to be like him... but sometimes the more I try to follow Rex Lapis, the more I get nervous and make mistakes...

|vo_08_03_title      = 응광에 대해...
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Ningguang]]
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Ningguang.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 「천권」을 역임하면 리월의 고대 율법을 해석하고 보충하게 되죠. 그중에서도 현재 「천권」이신 응광님의 처리 효율은 아무도 따라잡을 수 없죠. 다만 효율과 효과를 우선으로 추구하는 그녀의 태도는 종종 지적을 당하곤 하죠. 트집을 잡는 게 포용보다 훨씬 쉬우니까요
|vo_08_03_rm         = "Cheongwon"eul yeogimhamyeon Riwol-ui godae yulbeobeul haeseokhago bochunghage doejyo. Geujung'eseodo hyeonjae "Cheongwon"isin Eunggwangnim-ui cheori hyoyureun amudo ttarajabeul su eopjyo. Daman hyoyulgwa hyogwareul useoneuro chuguhaneun geunyeo-ui taedoneun jongjong jijeogeul danghagon hajyo. Teujibeul japneun ge poyongboda hwolssin swiunikkayo
|vo_08_03_tl         = When you serve as the "Tianquan", you interpret and supplement the ancient laws of Liyue. Among them, no one can catch up with the processing efficiency of Ningguang, who is currently the "Tianquan". However, her attitude toward efficiency and effectiveness is often pointed out. It's much easier to find fault with than to embrace.

|vo_08_04_title      = 각청에 대해・서먹함
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Keqing]]: Estrangement
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Keqing - Estrangement.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 전 그녀가 제군을 대하는 태도를 받아들일 수 없어요. 하지만… 제군께선 「감우, 이게 지금 리월에 필요한 사람이야」라고 말씀하셨죠. 제가 너무 어리석었어요. 제군의 말의 속뜻을 이해하려면 더 많은 일을 경험해 봐야겠죠
|vo_08_04_rm         = Jeon geunyeoga jeguneul daehaneun taedoreul badadeuril su eopsseoyo. Hajiman... jegunkkeseon "Gamu, ige jigeum Riwore piryohan saramiya"rago malsseumhasyeotjyo. Jega neomu eoriseogeosseoyo. Jegun-ui mal-ui soktteuseul ihaeharyeomyeon deo maneun ireul gyeongheomhae bwayagejjyo
|vo_08_04_tl         = I can't accept the way she talks about Rex Lapis. But... Rex Lapis said, "Ganyu, this is the woman who Liyue needs right now". I was so stupid. I'll have to experience more to understand what Rex Lapis means.

|vo_08_05_title      = 각청에 대해・관점 변화
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About Keqing: Changing Perspective
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Keqing - Changing Perspective.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 최근 그녀가 먼저 저에게 찾아와 벽수상로를 수리하는 방안을 논의하기 시작했어요. 게다가 제게 제군이라면 어떻게 했을지 물어봤어요. 그녀가 계속해서 상황을 분석하고 해결책을 생각해내는 모습을 보고… 조금이나마 그녀를 이해할 수 있게 됐어요
|vo_08_05_rm         = Choegeun geunyeoga meonjeo jeoege chajawa byeoksusangroreul surihaneun bang'aneul nonuihagi sijakaesseoyo. Gedaga jege jeguniramyeon eotteoke haesseulji mureobwasseoyo. Geunyeoga gyesokhaeseo sanghwang'eul bunseokhago haegyeolchaegeul saenggakhaenaeneun moseubeul bogo... jogeuminama geunyeoreul ihaehal su itge dwaesseoyo
|vo_08_05_tl         = Recently, she came to me first and started discussing how to repair the Bishui Waterway. Besides, she asked me what I would do if Rex Lapis were here. Seeing her continuing to analyze the situation and coming up with solutions... I could understand her a little bit.

|vo_08_06_title      = 행추에 대해...
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Xingqiu]]
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Xingqiu.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 비운상회의 그 푸른 옷의 소년, 그는 그의 부친과 형처럼 직물 경영에 크게 신경 쓰는 것 같지는 않아요. 아마 그에겐 더욱 중요한 일이 있는 거겠죠. 물론… 제 추측이지만…
|vo_08_06_rm         = Biunsanghoe-ui geu pureun osui sonyeon, geuneun geu-ui buchingwa hyeongcheoreom jikmul gyeong'yeong'e keuge singyeong sseuneun geot gatjineun annayo. Ama geuegen deouk jung'yohan iri itneun geogejjyo. Mullon... je cheuchugijiman...
|vo_08_06_tl         = The blue-clad boy of the Feiyun Commerce Guild, he doesn't seem to care much about textile management like his father and older brother. Maybe he has something more important to do. Of course... it's just my guess...

|vo_08_07_title      = 향릉에 대해...
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Xiangling]]
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Xiangling.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 향릉은 엄청 유명해요! 하지만… 전 「만민당」 근처엔 못 가겠어요… 그냥… 하, 못 가겠다니까요. 조, 좋아요. 비밀도 아니니 말할게요. 그곳엔 맛있는 음식 냄새로 가득하죠. 홀린 듯이 음식을 주문해 버리면 채소 요리도… 하… 절제할 수 없게 돼요. 그렇게 되면…
|vo_08_07_rm         = Hyangreung'eun eomcheong yumyeonghaeyo! Hajiman... jeon "Manmindang" geuncheoen mot gagesseoyo... geunyang... ha, mot gagetdanikkayo. Jo, joayo. Bimildo anini malhalkkeyo. Geugosen masinneun eumsik naemsaero gadeukhajyo. Hollin deusi eumsigeul jumunhae beorimyeon chaeso yorido... ha... jeoljehal su eopkke dwaeyo. Geureoke doemyeon...
|vo_08_07_tl         = Xiangling is very famous! But... I can't go anywhere near "Wanmin Restaurant"... It's just... ha, I can't go. O, okay. It's not even a secret, so I'll tell you. The place is filled with the smell of delicious food. If I order food like I'm possessed by something, the vegetable dish... sigh... I can't control myself. If that happens...

|vo_08_08_title      = 북두에 대해…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Beidou]]
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Beidou.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 최근 옥경대에서 남십자 함대에 대한 불평이 끊이질 않고 있습니다. 하지만 제 생각엔 북두 함장이 리월을 위해 세운 공은 유언비어를 날조하는 놈들보다 훨씬… 이런, 제가 말실수를 했네요
|vo_08_08_rm         = Choegeun okgyeongdaeeseo namsipja hamdaee daehan bulpyeong'i kkeunijil anko isseupnida. Hajiman je saenggagen Bukdu hamjang-i Riworeul wihae seun gong'eul yueonbieoreul naljohaneun nomdeulboda hwolssin... ireon, jega malsilsureul haenneyo
|vo_08_08_tl         = Recently, complains about The Crux is endless in Yujing Terrace. But I think the credit that Captain Beidou built for Liyue is far more than the scaremongering... Oh, no, I made a slip of the tongue.

|vo_08_09_title      = 요요에 대해...
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Yaoyao]]
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yaoyao.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = 요요… 전 총무부에서 아는 사람의 부탁을 받고, 그녀가 배에 오르지 못하도록 그녀를 돌봤어요. 총무부의 업무 범위요? 어… 음, 글쎄요
|vo_08_09_rm         = Yoyo... jeon chongmubuseo aneun saram-ui butageul batgo, geunyeoga baee oreuji mothadorok geunyeoreul dolbwasseoyo. Chongmubu-ui eommu beomwiyo? Eo... eum, geulsseyo
|vo_08_09_tl         = Yaoyao... I was asked by an acquaintance at the General Affairs Department to take care of her so that she wouldn't get on board. The scope of work in the General Affairs Department? Uh... well, I have no idea.

|vo_08_10_title      = 소에 대해...
|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About [[Xiao]]
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Xiao.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = 그는 줄곧 인간과 거리를 유지해왔어요. 본인의 성격 때문이겠죠… 그를 충분히 이해할 수 있지만, 그에게 「접근」을 할 수는 없어요. 그와 함께 「계약」을 이행하는 동료가 없어졌으니…
|vo_08_10_rm         = Geuneun julgot ingangwa georireul yujihaewasseoyo. Bonin-ui seonggyeok ttaemunigetjyo... geureul chungbunhi ihaehal su itjiman, geuege "Jeopgeun"eul hal suneun eopsseoyo. Geuwa hamkke "Gyeyak"eul ihaenghaneun dongryoga eopsseojyeosseuni...
|vo_08_10_tl         = He has kept his distance from humans all the time. It's probably because of his personality... I can fully understand him, but I can't "Approach" him. With him, there's no other colleague fulfilling the "Contract"...

|vo_08_11_title      = 연비에 대해...
|vo_08_11_subtitle   = About [[Yanfei]]
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yanfei.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx         = 연비요…? 그녀는 세상 물정 모르는 어린 소녀였을 때부터 제게 계약을 지키며 행복하게 살아야 한다고 말했어요. 지금은 아주 훌륭히 자라 리월의 유명인이 되었죠. 법률 고문이 하는 일은 아주 복잡하지만, 그녀가 늘 아무 걱정 없어 보여서 저도 안심돼요
|vo_08_11_rm         = Yeonbiyo...? Geunyeoneun sesang muljeong moreuneun eorin sonyeoyeosseul ttaebuteo jege gyeyageul jikimyeo haengbokhage saraya handago malhaesseoyo. Jigeumeun aju hullyunghi jara Riwol-ui yumyeong'ini doeeotjyo. Beopryul gomuni haneun ireul aju bokjaphajiman, geunyeoga neul amu geokjeong eopsseo boyeoseo jeodo ansimdwaeyo
|vo_08_11_tl         = Yanfei...? She's been telling me that I should live a happy life keeping my contract since she was a little girl. Now she's grown up to be a celebrity in Liyue. A legal counselor's job is very complicated, but I'm relieved that she always seems carefree.

|vo_08_12_title      = 신학에 대해…
|vo_08_12_subtitle   = About [[Shenhe]]
|vo_08_12_friendship = 4
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Shenhe.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx         = 그녀를 결코 잘 아는 편은 아니에요. 류운진군이 그녀에 대해 말하는 것만 몇 번 들었는데, 성격이 사납다고 해요. 성질을 억누르지 못하면 쉽게 주변을 파괴한다더라구요. 음… 너무 한가해서 그런 거 아닐까요? 제… 제가 일을 소개해줘야 하려나요?
|vo_08_12_rm         = Geunyeoreul gyeolko jal aneun pyeoneun anieyo. Ryuunjinguni geunyeoe daehae malhaneun geotman myeot beon deureotneunde, seonggyeogi sanapdago haeyo. Seongjireul eoknureuji mothamyeon swipge jubyeoneun pagoehandadeoraguyo. Eum... neomu hangahaeseo geureon geo anilkkayo? Je... jega ireul sogaehaejwoya haryeonayo?
|vo_08_12_tl         = I don't know her very well. I've only heard what Cloud Retainer said about her a few times, and she's said to have a fierce personality. When she cannot control her temper, she could easily destroy the surroundings. Hmm... isn't it because she's too free? S...should I introduce her to some work?

|vo_08_13_title      = 야란에 대해…
|vo_08_13_subtitle   = About [[Yelan]]
|vo_08_13_friendship = 4
|vo_08_13_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yelan.ogg
|vo_08_13_tx         = 야란 씨가 일 년 중 근 7할 정도 결근 상태이긴 하지만, 응광 님이 그분에게 그런 특권을 준 데엔 그럴 만한 이유가 있을 거예요. 물론, 제가 알아야 할 일이 아니라 구체적인 건 잘 모르겠네요. 하지만 전에 월해정으로 돌아가는 길에 야란 씨가 사람들과 담소 나누고 차 마시면서 아침 식사를 하고 있는 걸 본 적이 있어요. 그걸 보니까… 어쩐지 좀 부러웠어요
|vo_08_13_rm         = Yaran ssiga il nyeon jung geun chilhal jeongdo gyeolgeun sangtaeigin hajiman, Eunggwang nimi geubunege geureon teukgwoneul jun deen geureol manhan iyuga isseul geoyeyo. Mullon, jega araya hal iri anira guchejeogin geon jal moreugenneyo. Hajiman jeone wolhaejeong'euro doraganeun gire Yaran ssiga saramdeulgwa damso nanugo cha masimyeonseo achim siksareul hago inneun gol bon jeogi isseyo. Geugeol bonikka... eojjeonji jom bureowosseoyo
|vo_08_13_tl         = Although Ms. Yelan is absent for about 70 percent of the year, there must be a good reason why Ms. Ningguang gave her that privilege. Of course, I don't know the specifics, since not what I need to know. But I've seen Ms. Yelan chatting with people and having breakfast over tea on her way back to Yuehai Pavilion before. Seeing that... I was a bit envious.

|vo_09_01_title      = 감우에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 임시적인 업무요? 아, 구체적으로 말씀하실 필요 없어요. 요구 사항을 적어서 여기에 놓아주세요
|vo_09_01_rm         = Imsijeogin eommuyo? A, guchejeogeuro malsseumhasil piryo eopsseoyo. Yogu sahang'eu jeogeoseo yeogie noajuseyo
|vo_09_01_tl         = Temporary work? Oh, you don't have to be specific. Please write down the requirements and put them here.
|vo_09_02_title      = 감우에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 「감우에 대해 더 많이 알고 싶어」… 이, 이건 무슨 일에 필요한 거죠? 저, 전 이런 걸 처리해본 적이 없어서… 작년 연말의 업무 보고서를 외우면 될까요? 아, 안 되는군요
|vo_09_02_rm         = "Gamue daehae deo mani algo sipeo"... i, igeon museun ire piryohan geojyo? Jeo, jeon ireon geol cheorihaebon jeogi eopsseoseo... jaknyeon yeonmal-ui eommu bogoseoreul oeumyeon doelkkayo? A, an doeneungunyo
|vo_09_02_tl         = "I want to know more about Ganyu"... W, what is this for? I, I haven't taken care of those... should I memorize last year's end of the year task report? Ah, I can't.
|vo_09_03_title      = 감우에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 생각해봤는데… 「업무」라면, 부끄러워할 필요 없겠죠. 저에 대해 알고 싶다면, 이 머리 장식부터… 사실 이건 뿔이에요. 제 몸에는 신수 「기린」의 피가 흐르죠. 음… 이해되셨으면 이 비밀 유지 계약서에 서명해 주세요. 절대 다른 사람에게 이야기하면 안 돼요…
|vo_09_03_rm         = Saenggakhaebwanneunde... "Eommu"ramyeon, bukkeureowohal piryo eopgejjyo. Joe daehae algo sipdamyeon, i meori jangsikbuteo... sasil igeon ppurieyo. Je momeneun sinsu "Girin"ui piga heureujyo. Eum... ihaedoesyeosseumyeon i bimil yuji gyeyakseoe seomyeonghae juseyo. Jeoldae dareun saramege iyagihamyeon an dwaeyo...
|vo_09_03_tl         = I've been thinking... if it's "Business", I shouldn't be shy. If you want to know about me, start with this hair ornament... it's actually a horn. I have the blood of Adepti, the "Qilin". Well... if you understand, please sign this confidentiality agreement. You should never tell anyone else...
|vo_09_04_title      = 감우에 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 전 신수의 혼혈 후예지만 동시에 인간의 피도 흐르고 있어요. 몇 년이 지났는데도, 제가 리월항 인간의 삶에 녹아들었는지는 모르겠네요… 아마 땅을 파고들어가는 풀 슬라임처럼 데이터와 보고서에 파묻혀 도피하는 거겠죠
|vo_09_04_rm         = Jeon sinsu-ui honhyeol huyejiman dongsie ingan-ui pido heureugo isseoyo. Myeot nyeoni jinatneundedo, jega Riwolhang ingan-ui salme nogadeureotneunjineun moreugenneyo... ama ttang'eul pagodeureoganeun pul seullaimcheoreom deiteowa bogoseoe pamuchyeo dopihaneun geogejjyo
|vo_09_04_tl         = I'm a descendant between Adepti and human, so at the same time, human blood is flowing in my veins. Years later, I don't know if I've been incorporated into the life of a human in Liyue Harbor... Maybe I'm just like a dedro slime digging into the ground, burying it in data and reports and fleeing away.
|vo_09_05_title      = 감우에 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 저와 이야기해 줘서 고마워요. 당신을 만난 후, 10여 년 동안 가장 말을 많이 한 것 같아요… 이렇게 훈련을 계속한다면 비서 외에 다른 직업에도 종사할 수 있겠어요. 몇 백 년 동안 익숙해지면, 치명적인 실수는 안 하겠죠
|vo_09_05_rm         = Jeowa iyagihae jwoseo gomawoyo. Dangsineul mannan hu, sibyeo nyeon dong'an gajang mareul mani han geot gatayo... ireoke hunryeoneul gyesokhandamyeon biseo oee dareun jigeobedo jongsahal su itgesseoyo. Myeot baek nyeon dong'an iksukhaejimyeon, chimyeongjeogin silsuneun an hagejjyo
|vo_09_05_tl         = Thank you for talking to me. After meeting you, I think I talked the most for more than 10 years... If I continue training like this, I will be able to work in other jobs besides being a secretary. If I get used to it for hundreds of years, I won't make a fatal mistake.

|vo_10_01_title      = 감우의 취미...
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 취미라, 취미는… 일이에요. 네? 일은 취미가 아니라고요? 왜요? 취미는 자신이 하고 싶고, 하면 즐거운 일을 말하는 게 아닌가요? 그럼 취미가 일인 게 무슨 문제가 되나요?
|vo_10_01_rm         = Chwimira, chwimineun... irieyo. Ne? Ireun chwimiga aniragoyo? Waeyo? Chwimineun jasini hago sipgo, hamyeon jeulgeoun ireul malhaneun ge aningayo? Geureom chwimiga irin ge museun munjega doenayo?
|vo_10_01_tl         = Hobby, my hobby is... it's working. Huh? Working is not a hobby? Why? Isn't your hobby about what you want to do and what you enjoy doing? Then what's wrong with having a hobby like working?
|vo_10_02_title      = 감우의 고민...
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = 사람들은 왜 항상… 자신의 가치가 남보다 높다는 걸 증명하려고 안달일까요? 존재한다는 것 자체가 충분히 아름다운 일이잖아요?
|vo_10_02_rm         = Saramdeureun wae hangsang... jasin-ui gachiga namboda nopdaneun geol jeungmyeongharyeogo andarilkkayo? Jonjaehandaneun geot jachega chungbunhi areumdaun irijanayo?
|vo_10_02_tl         = Why do people always... fret to prove that they're worth more than anyone else? Existing itself is beautiful enough by itself, right?
|vo_10_03_title      = 좋아하는 음식...
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = 「먹고 마시는 건 풍요로워야 한다」가 제 수칙입니다. 그러니 저 「선도장」 좀 제 시야에서 치워주세요…
|vo_10_03_rm         = "Meokgo masineun geon pung'yorowoya handa"ga je suchigipnida. Geureoni jeo "Seondojang" jom je siyaeseo chiwojuseyo...
|vo_10_03_tl         = "Eating and drinking should be rich" is my rule. So please get that "Adeptus' Temptation" out of my sight...
|vo_10_04_title      = 싫어하는 음식...
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = 우리 일족은 엄격한 채식주의자예요. 육류 요리는 사절이에요. 음, 맞아요. 돼지기름으로 튀긴 채소 완자도 안 돼요… 안 된다구요 (뜨끔) 전 냄새로 알아차릴 수 있어요
|vo_10_04_rm         = Uri iljogeun eomgyeokhan chaesikjuuijayeyo. Yukryu yorineun sajeorieyo. Eum, majayo. Dwaejigireumeuro twigin chaeso wanjado an dwaeyo... an doendagoyo. Jeon naemsaero aracharil su isseoyo
|vo_10_04_tl         = My kind are strict vegetarians. Meat dishes are not allowed. Well, that's right. No vegetable meatballs fried in pork oil... no. I can tell by the smell it.

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_11_01_title      = 선물 획득・첫 번째
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = 아주 제대로 된 요리네요…. 아! 제가 너무 많이 먹었나요?
|vo_11_01_rm         = Aju jedaero doen yorineyo... A! Jega neomu mani meogeotnayo?
|vo_11_01_tl         = It's a decent food... Ah! Did I eat too much?

|vo_11_02_title      = 선물 획득・두 번째
|vo_11_02_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = 제가 먹는 거에 많이 까다로운 편인데, 정말 고생하셨어요…
|vo_11_02_rm         = Jega meokneun geoe mani kkadaroun pyeoninde, jeongmal gosaenghasyeosseoyo...
|vo_11_02_tl         = I'm very picky when it comes to food, you have worked so hard...

|vo_11_03_title      = 선물 획득・세 번째
|vo_11_03_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = 마음은 알겠어요. 하지만 기름진 음식은… 사양할게요
|vo_11_03_rm         = Maeumeun algesseoyo. Hajiman gireumji eumsigeun... sayanghalgeyo
|vo_11_03_tl         = I understand. But I will decline... oily food.

|vo_12_01_title      = 생일…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 생일 축하해요. 당신에게 이렇게 오랫동안 신세를 졌는데, 선물도 준비하지 못했네요. 이거 참… 손 뒤에 숨긴 거요? 휴… 다 봤군요… 실패한 청심화 푸딩이에요… 완벽하게 만들겠다고 다짐했는데… 맛, 맛있다고요? 저, 정말요…?
|vo_12_01_rm         = Saeng'il chukhahaeyo. Dangsinege ireoke oraetdong'an sinsereul jyeotneunde, seonmuldo junbihaji mothaetneyo. Igeo cham... son dwie sumgin geoyo? Hyu... da bwatgunyo... silpaehan cheongsimhwa puding'ieyo... wanbyeokhage mandeulgetdago dajimhaenneunde... mat, masitdagoyo? Jeo, jeongmalyo...?
|vo_12_01_tl         = Happy birthday. I owed you for this long, but I haven't even prepared a present. This is... this thing I'm hiding behind my hand? Phew... You've seen it all... It's a failed Qingxin flower pudding... I promised to make it perfect... I, it tastes good? R, really...?

|vo_13_01_title      = 돌파의 느낌・기
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = 이 힘은… 정말 오랜만이군요
|vo_13_01_rm         = I himeun... jeongmal oraenmanigunyo
|vo_13_01_tl         = This power... it has been a long time.
|vo_13_02_title      = 돌파의 느낌・승
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = 만약… 평화로운 방식으로 해결할 수 있다면. 아, 아니에요…
|vo_13_02_rm         = Manyak... pyeonghwaroun bangsigeuro haegyeolhal su itdamyeon. A, anieyo...
|vo_13_02_tl         = What if... we can deal with this with a peaceful way. Ah, it's nothing...
|vo_13_03_title      = 돌파의 느낌・전
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = 이게 바로 새로운 삶의 길… 알겠어요, 원망하지 않을게요
|vo_13_03_rm         = Ige baro saeroun salmui gil... algesseoyo, wonmanghaji anneulgeyo
|vo_13_03_tl         = This is my new path of life... alright, I won't blame anyone.
|vo_13_04_title      = 돌파의 느낌・결
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 예전에 고서에서 「기린이 싸우면 해가 빛을 잃는다」란 말을 본 적이 있어요. 사실 그 정도는 아니지만, 만약 당신을 위해 싸워야 한다면, 제 모든 힘을 바칠게요
|vo_13_04_rm         = Yeojeone goseoeseo "Girini ssaumyeon haega bicheul ilneunda"ran mareul bon jeogi isseoyo. Sasil geu jeongdoneun anijiman, manyak dangsineul wihae ssawoya handamyeon, je modeun himeul bachilgeyo
|vo_13_04_tl         = I read a saying in an old book that said "When a Qilin fights, the sun loses light". It's actually not like that, but if I have to fight for you, I'll use all my power.
}}
